boardgame.name: 12 Days
boardgame.description: The holiday-themed 12 Days takes the familiar _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Twelve Days of Christmas_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; song and twists it into a quick-playing card game. Over twelve rounds, players try to re-gift unpopular cards while keeping cards that are strong enough to win the day, while also keeping a careful eye for bonus scoring at the end of the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The gift deck consists of eighty cards: one partridge in a pear tree, two turtle doves, and so on up to twelve drummers drumming, as well as one card each for Mr. and Mrs. Claus. Shuffle this deck, then deal each player twelve cards. Each round a new holiday card is up for grabs, with the cards ranked from 1 to 12 and being worth 1-12 points. In a round, a player:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Gifts a present to the player to his left,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Opens presents and tries to win the day with the best present, and_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Buys a new gift to refill his hand._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;More specifically, all players simultaneously pass one face-down gift card to their left-hand neighbor. Then everyone chooses one gift card in hand and reveals them simultaneously. Whoever plays the lowest gift card wins that round's holiday card; in the event of a tie for lowest, with the Clauses counting as zero, then the next lowest card wins. Each player then draws one card to bring their hand back to twelve cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After twelve rounds, players score points for each holiday card they've collected. In addition, whoever holds the most gift cards for each rank scores as many points as that rank, with all tied players scoring in the event of a tie. Whoever has the most points wins. Happy holidays!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Calliope Games (CLP112) We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re delighted to announce 12 Days, a Christmas-themed trick-taking card game by James Ernest and Mike Selinker and illustrated by Echo Chernik. Inspired by the iconic Christmas carol _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Twelve Days of Christmas_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and designed by James Ernest and Mike Selinker, 12 Days is ingrained with familiar play patterns of traditional card games, making it feel like a true holiday classic.

Calliope Games (CLP112) We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re delighted to announce 12 Days, a Christmas-themed trick-taking card game by James Ernest and Mike Selinker and illustrated by Echo Chernik. Inspired by the iconic Christmas carol _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;The Twelve Days of Christmas_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; and designed by James Ernest and Mike Selinker, 12 Days is ingrained with familiar play patterns of traditional card games, making it feel like a true holiday classic.

Brand new, never played in tuck box. Item is in very good condition. I treat my games very well. If there are components inside the game they are most likely bagged in 4mm, thick bags. I will work with you to ship the most cost efficient way or however you prefer. When I ship things I take extra measurers to mitigate any potential shipping damage. If the item is a small card game the shipping will be USPS First Class and will be around $5 total with shipping materials.
